meanings.definition: A type of bird that feeds on sap from trees.
meanings.sent1: The sapsuckers peck at the tree bark to get the sap.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of sapsuckers perched on the maple tree.
meanings.sent3: The sapsuckers had a sweet tooth for the tree sap.
meanings.sent4: The sapsuckers were like tiny syrup collectors in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The sapsuckers left small holes in the tree trunk from their feeding.

meanings.definition: A person who is easily deceived or taken advantage of.
meanings.sent1: Be careful, don't be a sapsuckers and fall for their tricks.
meanings.sent2: He realized he had been a sapsuckers in the scam.
meanings.sent3: The sapsuckers believed the too-good-to-be-true offer.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a sapsuckers when she realized she had been fooled.
meanings.sent5: The sapsuckers learned to be more cautious after being tricked.
